scenario_text.value: What are you two looking at?
We were just checking the factory layout...

Based on the way it looks, there could be
a lot of areas to explore in the back...

In the back? Didn’t we already find a way in?
It doesn’t lead back there, though...
There must also be a hidden passage...

Maybe there’s a way through that’s blocked by
the ruins now.

We need to figure out where Renamon is.
Let’s see if we can find another way in.
Yeah, we can find another way easy.

(The way they bounce ideas off each other...
They’re really getting along.)
Who do you think’ll find it first?
Whatever, bro. I ain’t losing to you.

(Oh yeah, I wonder if the professor’s feeling
any better?)
